TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataListDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider, class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceProvider
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataListDesigner Inherits TemplatedControlDesigner Implements IDataBindingSchemaProvider, IDataSourceProvider
type BaseDataListDesigner = class inherit TemplatedControlDesigner interface IDataBindingSchemaProvider interface IDataSourceProvider

summary.span: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the class.

span.span: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计器宿主中，当用户从源切换到设计视图中，描述控件的标记源代码派生自抽象类进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当用户切换回源视图时，设计时控件是保存到标记的源代码，编辑到 Web 页的标记。When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 抽象类用作基类的派生自的控件提供设计时支持组件设计器宿主中。The abstract class serves as a base class for components that provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the in a designer host. 类属性提供了以下功能：The class properties provide the following functionality: 属性返回对象，它通常包含一个对象，派生自继承树中每个级别的设计器的类。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - ， ， ，和属性提供对关联控件的相应属性的访问。The , , , and properties provide access to the corresponding properties of the associated control. - 属性提供对关联控件的数据源设计器的访问。The property provides access to the designer of the data source of the associated control. 属性获取数据源的默认视图。The property gets the default view of the data source. 类方法提供了以下功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联的控件。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control. 方法将调用该控件的组件编辑器。The method invokes a component editor for the control. 方法用于添加、 删除或隐藏关联控件的设计时属性。The method is used to add, remove, or shadow design-time properties of the associated control. - 方法生成一个可以在设计时作为数据源使用的对象。The method generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time. 方法从关联控件的容器中获取数据源。The method gets the data source from the container of the associated control. 方法从控件容器中解析为特定数据成员获取的数据源。The method gets the data source from the control container, resolved to a specific data member. 方法获取模板容器的数据源。The method gets the data source of the template container. - 对关联控件的更改时调用方法。The method is called when there is a change to the associated control. 关联的控件数据源发生更改时调用方法。The method is called when the associated control data source has changed. 关联的控件数据源的架构更改时调用方法。The method is called when the schema of the associated control data source changes. 已应用的自动格式设置方案时调用方法。The method is called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied. - 和方法可以重写以实现应发生关联的控件样式发生更改时或设计器的模板编辑谓词已更改时，分别的功能。The and methods can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when an associated control style has changed or when the designer template-editing verbs have changed, respectively. 方法可处理属性生成器事件。The method handles the property-builder event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在内部构建的新实例类创建派生自的关联的控件时类或该控件在设计图面上的副本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the class or a copy of that control on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置设计器的属性会导致要设置的关联控件的属性。Setting the designer's property causes the property of the associated control to be set. 如果设置为，，该值指示新的数据源为要定义**创建数据源**显示对话框。If the is set to a , indicating a new data source is to be defined, a **Create Data Source** dialog box is displayed. 如果设置为，该值指示没有任何数据源，设置为空字符串 ("")。If the is set to a indicating there is no data source, the is set to an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取表示通过绑定到关联控件的数据源的默认视图属性设置为方法的对象。The property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control by passing the property to the method of the object. 如果不返回任何视图，或未设置属性，方法的用于获取视图名称和第一个视图名称用于获取默认视图。If no view is returned or the property is not set, the method of the is used to get the view names and the first view name is used to get the default view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器宿主调用方法时它已准备好使用设计器来呈现控件派生自类。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the class. 方法后其基方法配置属性，并连接到所需的设计器的操作的事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. 连接到设计时数据源和更新的设计时标记。The connects to the design-time data source and updates the design-time markup. 如果属性实现接口，连接， ，并事件。If the property implements the interface, the connects the , , and events. `component`参数是派生自控件，即与此设计器中或该控件的副本相关联。The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the , that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时调用方法派生自控件的事件类执行。The method is called when the event of a control that is derived from the class executes. 通常情况下，这是为了响应属性更改控件上 (例如，**属性**网格更改)。Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change). 如果控件绑定到对象发生更改时，该控件重绘设计图面上。If the object to which the control is bound is changed, the control is redrawn on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用派生自方法来隐藏相应的设计时属性在设计器实现，使用的各种控件属性和将属性添加到或移除属性**属性**网格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 为控件派生自类，创建设计时属性，以隐藏， ， ，并属性。For controls that are derived from the class, the creates design-time properties to shadow the , , , and properties.

span.para: 重写方法将属性添加到或更改设计时属性集合中的属性的特性。请务必在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。
Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection. Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
